channel.title: Any Metalfags?
channel.description:
Ohai. We got any Headbangers on these forums? Fawk. If you're going to spam and flame about the topic. My advice to you is GTFO. Go fap to rap.
Back on topic; if you are a Metal listener. What bands do you like? Post a link to your favorite song.
Bullet for my valentine - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d_GJyUK0GUI Trivium - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EApnhO2OIrw Arch enemy - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=n9AcG0glVu4 Metallica - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pXfKJvlU050 (It's drop D tuning for the idiot that uploaded it.. Closest thing I could find to the original.)
gogogogo Post your favorite songs.

item.title: Any Metalfags?
item.dc:creator: @LolPigeon LolPigeon
item.description:
@LolPigeon wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:45, topic:287882”]Cba to post links, but:

Avenged Sevenfold
Disturbed
System of a Down
Slipknot
Metallica
Firewind
ICP[/quote]

Avenged Sevenfold - Example of new shit, not to mention the guitarist is an emo faggot.
Disturbed - Not bad but can fall into the category of new shit.
ICP - Just no.

Myself, I <3 System of a down. And Scars on Broadway. <- Not metal tbh

Other shit.

[center]
In Flames - Reroute To Remain
In Flames - Dismiss The Cynics
Korn - Freak On A Leash
Korn - Coming Undone
Korn -Y’all Want a Single
Slipknot - Pulse Of The Maggots
Slipknot - Psychosocial
Children Of Bodom - Are You Dead Yet?
Children Of Bodom - In Your Face

Buckethead shit I find him entertaining to watch, he’s an amazing guitarist.
Buckethead - Final Wars
Buckethead - Nottingham Lace
Buckethead - Soothsayer
Buckethead - Welcome to bucketheadland

[/center]

Read full topic

item.title: Any Metalfags?
item.dc:creator: @k_a_h_leader Aeolian
item.description:
@k_a_h_leader wrote:

[center][b]Well, I thought I’d share some of my music with you folks. These are mainly emo/metal bands. I really enjoy listening too them.

This is NOT in alphabetical order.

In fear and Faith - Live Love Die
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uNYYX3e7LsQ

As I lay Dying - Through Struggle (Kind of old.)
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BhYT-7bzHis

Bullet for my Valentine - Tears don’t fall
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7m_MJX58qk8&feature=fvst

Secondhand Serenade - Your Call (One of all time favorites.)
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0rgInHvW8Ic

The Red Jumpsuit Apparatus - Face Down (One of all time favorites.)
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4nckjoBALgM

Trivium - Pull Harder on the Strings of your Martyr
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4W8joPupu3Q

Boys like Girls - The great escape
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x5VdYqd6CdA

Breaking Benjamin - The Diary of Jane
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DWaB4PXCwFU

Owl City - Rainbow Veins
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2EsMHFXdLxI

Owl City - Hot air Balloon
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=R6OQFnUrbW8

Side note: Owl City is one person writing all of his own music. I like him because he is original and his music is very uplifting and brings feelings of joy to everyone.

Haste the Day - The Minor Prophets
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ioYpxgTgNe4

Side Note: Something about this song takes you by your soul and makes you get sucked in to its beauty.
-End of list as of July 05, 2009-

Anyways, I just thought I would share all of these with you. If you guys enjoy them I may add many more.
[/b][/center]

Read full topic

item.title: Any Metalfags?
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:34, topic:287882”]There’s a lot of metal bands I like. The big one today is All That Remains. My favorite song by them… It’s hard to choose. I’d have to go with Empty Inside, Six, or Two Weeks. There’s tons more that I like, but those are my favorite.

My favorite metal band of all time would have to be Metallica. My favorite song by them would have to be… … I don’t know. It’s hard to choose. There’s Fuel, The Day That Never Comes, Seek and Destroy, Fade to Black, Enter Sandman, One, All Nightmare Long, Battery, Master of Puppets, Disposable Heroes, and more. I can’t choose honestly.

Oh and, I can’t be fucked to get any links.[/quote]
Not bad Lin. All that remains is a good band. Have you heard killswitch engage? They’re good aswell.

Read full topic

item.title: Any Metalfags?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

There’s a lot of metal bands I like. The big one today is All That Remains. My favorite song by them… It’s hard to choose. I’d have to go with Empty Inside, Six, or Two Weeks. There’s tons more that I like, but those are my favorite.

My favorite metal band of all time would have to be Metallica. My favorite song by them would have to be… … I don’t know. It’s hard to choose. There’s Fuel, The Day That Never Comes, Seek and Destroy, Fade to Black, Enter Sandman, One, All Nightmare Long, Battery, Master of Puppets, Disposable Heroes, and more. I can’t choose honestly.

Oh and, I can’t be fucked to get any links.

Read full topic

item.title: Any Metalfags?
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:30, topic:287882”][quote author=_™ link=topic=380615.msg2861138#msg2861138 date=1247163626]

[quote author=Speljohan link=topic=380615.msg2861129#msg2861129 date=1247163469]
Trivium and bullet for my valentine aren’t metal, they are metalcore, hence emo.

Metallica made one good album (Kill ém all) and the rest was shit cause they changed their style and sold out.

Arch Enemy is a rip-off off Carcass (listen to the vocals/riff style and you’ll hear in instantly)

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Jx-0VJvQTZM this is metal[/quote]

Kill 'em All was true metal, totally agreed. Go '80s.

EDIT: Ride The Lightning, 1984. Wasn’t that bad, was it? http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xjlgUx7_aN0
[/quote]the album wasn’t very good at all, it had a few good songs[/quote] Creeping death from Ride the lightning was a great song.

Read full topic
